meanings.definition: To place or fix in position for use
meanings.sent1: He installs the new light bulb in the lamp.
meanings.sent2: The technician installs the software on the computer.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel installs acorns in the tree for winter.
meanings.sent4: She installs happiness in every room she enters.
meanings.sent5: The chef installs flavor in every dish he cooks.

meanings.definition: To establish in an office, position, or place
meanings.sent1: The company installs a new manager in the department.
meanings.sent2: The president installs a new cabinet member.
meanings.sent3: The cat installs itself on the warm spot by the window.
meanings.sent4: The idea installs itself firmly in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The teacher installs discipline in the classroom.

meanings.definition: To set up for use or service
meanings.sent1: She installs the tent for the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic installs the new engine in the car.
meanings.sent3: The robot installs itself in the charging station.
meanings.sent4: The melody installs itself in your mind and stays.
meanings.sent5: The artist installs creativity in every stroke of the brush.
